original_text: Then Zipporah took a sharp stone, and cut off the foreskin of her son, and cast it at his feet, and said, Surely a bloody husband art thou to me.
korean_text: 십보라가 돌칼을 가져다가 그의 아들의 포피를 베어 그의 발에 갖다 대며 이르되 당신은 참으로 내게 피 남편이로다 하니

sentences.original_text: Then Zipporah took a sharp stone
and cut off the foreskin of her son
and cast it at his feet
and said, Surely a bloody husband art thou to me
